initCollateral(address,address,address,a.details: Only the `owner` can call this function

params.p: List of all the parameters with which to initialize the pool

setOwner(address).details: With this function the timelock can be given the ownership of the contract

owner().notice: Address that is allowed to call the `initCollateral` function

setOwner(address).notice: Changes the owner of a contract

userdoc.notice: Contract that is used to facilitate the deployment of a given collateral on mainnet
